channel.title: COVID on Dhiraj Balakrishnan
channel.description: Recent content in COVID on Dhiraj Balakrishnan

item.title: Organizing a Hackathon During Covid Pandemic
item.description: You just fight to live another day. Just after completing my term as an Innovation Committee Lead for ITDP Hyderabad, I got an opportunity to work with the DELL TIDE Hackathon team.
